GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: returns an article object by passed id

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns the comments from a selected article

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to an article

exampleResponse.body: I can't believe it's not butter
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

exampleResponse.body: I can't believe it's not butter
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by id and returns nothing
